| History                 = The Bacchae were loyal servants to [[Hippolyta (Earth-616)|Hippolyta]] and [[Hades (Earth-616)|Hades]].

They were one of the Western Hemisphere's most powerful criminal organizations. Who were based at Tartarus, in the heart of Wall Street. A private pleasure palace for those among the international business elite who consider the Hellfire Club passe. They attempted to establish control over all of the mutant-owned businesses in downtown Manhattan. It's scheme was shut down by members of the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]] and [[X-Treme Sanctions Executive (Earth-616)|X.S.E.]].{{r|Uncanny X-Men Vol 1 450|451}}
